评论概述: The perfect "shopping list" sized Post-It note.  Colors may vary, so beware.
评论详情: In today's world, name-brand products that are worth the price premium are few and far between, but 3M is still the best option available when it comes to adhesives in all their forms.  This product is an updated formula for their classic Post-It Notes:  they advertise 'super sticky' adhesive, and the size is larger, too.This particular product consists of four pads of sticky notes in a 4"x6" size - about the size most people would use as a shopping list.  These are perfect for a to-do list, perhaps leaving instructions for a babysitter or keeping track of groceries you want to buy on your refrigerator.Each pad is in a different color - you get one of each of the four primary colors in a lighter pastel version.  I like the colors I received, but it's important to note that they aren't the ones that were advertised in the listing.  I definitely received product 4621R-4SSNRP, but I got primary colors instead of a the more springtime pastel arrangement that was advertised.  I actually prefer what I received, but you should be aware the colors might vary if the specifics matter for you.Because these scream 'refrigerator' to me, I do wish they came with a magnet on the back.  I may explore adding one myself, but I'm skeptical of how well they'll hold up in that sort of usage without a slightly thicker backing plate.  It's not a flaw in the product, but I do think it's a missed opportunity.So, are these twice as sticky?  I honestly don't know.  I tried to do some side by side tests with other Post-It notes I had around the house, and they behave... exactly the same.  The adhesive feels just about as sticky to me, and both notes work about as well.  They still don't love sticking to dirty/dusty surfaces, and they still work perfectly on clean, flat ones.  I think these are a great choice, but I'm not sure if I can really confirm the 2x claim:  I'm sure there's a lab test somewhere where these perform that much better, but in real world use they seem pretty equivalent to me.Which isn't a bad thing!  Everyone likes genuine Post-It Notes, and they're a modern classic for a reason.  If you're looking for a larger format that still has the classic Post-It quality, these are exactly what you need.

I love this sticky notes, they are perfect for lists and the pack comes with so many it is a great value for the amount you get. 评论概述: Actual 3M Post-It notepads - plenty of stick
评论详情: I've been using generic sticky notes for years - whether they are the ubiquitous yellow squares or larger lined note pads. While the generic ones are usually "fine," they do leave something to be desired when you try to stick them to non-paper surfaces.  These 100% recycled Post-It notepads from 3M are just...so much better than the generic pads.These 4x6 lined pads have the shape and outline that you expect, with a bigger open space at the top where the sticky back is.  I can't tell that they are made of 100% recycled materials as they perform just as well as regular 3M notepads.  You can write with pens and pencils and everything is readable.  Where these pads beat any generic pads is in their sticking power.  These 3M pads will pretty much stick to anything and actually stay there until you manually apply some force to remove them.  It's the type of stick that you want.  You can put them on glossy painted walls, flat matte painted walls, whiteboards, stainless steel refrigerators, wood-finished bookshelves, whatever.  It'll stick and stay there.  And as long as you take it off within a reasonable timeframe (a couple weeks, I think) you shouldn't have any residue left behind.  Definitely 5-stars.

I love the color and size of these notepads! The paper is the perfect thickness and the stickiness is great. You can't tell too much of a difference from regular paper to this new great recycled paper! It says super sticky, and I would say they are slightly more sticky than regular post-its, but nothing to write home about. Overall though, these definitely have the quality you'd expect from post-it :)

These post-it notes are great.  The work as well as you would expect from the great name of post-its and I love how they are made from 100% recycled paper.  Also they come in beautiful pastel colors.  These are a win-win.

I really like the colors included in this set, the size is perfect for grocery lists.  The paper quality and stickiness is consistent with the regular Post-It Notes, I don't really like the "green marketing" here. They should just use recycled paper for all their notes if they actually want to make a difference, no one would notice the change.  What I really enjoy is that the paper is great quality and fountain pen friendly. I'm a big pen nerd and tested a few different inks, I didn't experience any feathering or bleeding which is great.  The notes are quite sticky, I didn't have luck trying to stick the whole pad upright on my fridge though. It works with the little square note pads, but I think these are too heavy for the strip of adhesive on the back. I do wish the back of the pad had a full sheet of the adhesive so I could post up the whole pad. But individually they stick great, it's handy to be able to stick it to your shopping cart or whatnot.  This is my favorite format for Post-Its, I definitely recommend.

These are a good size too, not like the tiny ones. Not much else to say, they're a handy thing to have around!

评论概述: Good Size and Right Amount of Stickiness
评论详情: Post-It Notes are one of those things that we never seem to have enough of in the house. They're always handy and they're great for marking things as well as keeping short lists. I particularly like this size - I have a pad of these in the office that I use, so I was glad to have some for home as well.  These are 4"x6" pads that come in 4 colors and are ruled so they're particularly useful for keeping lists. I use these for short runs to the grocery store. The ruled lines make keeping my writing straight easy, and the sticky back makes them stay put on my clipboard when I take that with me for larger trips.  These are good and sticky but they aren't so sticky that they tear when pulling them off the stack. That is a problem I have seen with off-brand notes.  I like the colors. The pad I have at work is yellow; these are much nicer.  I am pleased with these pads and will buy more when I use them up. They're a good size for my purposes and they have the right amount of sticky backing.

These are great Post-it pads. I have all the Post-its and probably will never run out, yet I still buy more. I have them in all of my drawers. These are great for whatever you need a note for, and I love a lined notepad! I love the pastel colors and the fact that the paper is recycled, I love that too. I have tried non-brand Post-its and they just aren't as good, so I don't go there anymore and just stick with the 3M brand originals. There is no residue on the surface when I peel these off, which is how it should be!

评论概述: These stick better than regular Post-its, not so much that they will peel off the finish
评论详情: I have one application that traditional Post-it notes fail at.  I prepare food for distributions in plastic bags, close them up, and attach sticky notes that say who they go to.  I started by using traditional Post-it notes but they failed me right away.  The notes would get knocked off through all the handling, or fall off if a bag was jammed into the freezer.  So I also use Scotch Magic Tape.  I didn't think 3M would mind if I used one of their products to help out another.I hadn't heard of 3M super sticky Post-it notes so I thought I would give them a try.  Their adhesive is a little stronger, and I find I don't have to reinforce them with Scotch Tape on plastic bags any more.  I'm not fully satisfied yet because I got the 4" x 6" pads of super sticky Post-it notes.  These are too large for me, and dangle off the sides of the plastic bags.  I've been trimming off the bottoms of the notes to make them more compact, but when I next purchase I'll be looking for a smaller size.One brainiac stuck some of the notes I had written (for later attachment to bags) onto a finished wood furniture surface.  I almost had a heart attack, but found if I slowly peeled the super sticky notes off I could do so without causing any damage to the finish.  I read on the packaging that the adhesive used is water based, so I thought if I found I was lifting the finish I would try to dampen the notes from the written side, to get the adhesive to release.  Glad I didn't have to go there.One last detail:  you are reading a Vine review, which means this product was sent to me without my having to pay for it.  I never believed Vine reviews, I felt people would say anything to get free stuff.  The Vine program, at least for me, is a little different:  I only get what I go out of my way to ask for, and everything I get is reported as income to me, so I'll have to pay income taxes at what will probably be reported as list price.  I may actually lose on the deal.  But I wanted to try these super sticky Post-it notes, they actually do work for me where the traditional Post-it notes don't, I didn't know they existed before I saw them available for review, and, hopefully, my experience has been a help to you.

Fantastic size for notetaking.  Exactly the quality you expect from an official Post-it product.This is the first recycled product I've ever received that also comes in a recycled container and recycled paper mailer (though that may be Amazon's choice).  No plastic whatsoever.
Use these nearly every day for notes, work great, love the super sticky.

I love sticky notes! More than I should. And I have tried to off brand because of my budget.... They never stick well. These stick great! They're authentic name brand. They are easy to write one, easy to reposition or move from book to book/screen to binder, etc. I love that they're made with recycled material, too!

I have a very fast-paced, ever-changing job, and I track many of the last-minute changes/needs with post-it notes strategically placed all over my desk and wall. And while regular post-its work great, I often find my own chicken scratch writing to be hard to follow. However, these post-its with their extra space (about twice as long as a normal post-it, and about 1.5 x as wide), and the lines provide a perfect amount of space and functionality for me to stay just a smidge more organized. The adhesion is also perfect for my needs too. I've stuck these to computer monitors, plastic boards, wooden desks, and textured walls (by far my #1 nemesis for post-its), and they have yet to disappoint.

评论概述: Great quality, as usual from Post-it
评论详情: As a Product Designer, I use a LOT of post it notes, and I've learned that name brand Post-its are genuinely better than most knock off brands. They don't bleed through when you write with a Sharpie, and they keep their stickiness even if you reposition them a few times.  This product is the first Post-it I've seen that's made from recycled paper, which I appreciate. I tested it for bleed through, and it worked just as well as the older (non-recycled) ones I had before. The adhesion seems just as good too.  I'm glad to support a product made from recycled material, especially when it works just as well as the ones I'm used to! Great job, Post-it!

My wife & I use these as we both work from home & they are a good size while also not taking up too much room on our smaller at home desks. Like the different colors & they are big enough to fit a good amount of text on, but can still travel easy if you need to stick in a desk drawer or backpack.

I get so tired of cheap sticky notes, so I thought I would try these.  They are perfect!  I love the notepad notes, and these stick, and stay stuck.  I can write myself a grocery list, and stick this on the fridge for when the day arrives to head to the store.  They have lots of room to write on, and they come in pretty colors.  So far, I love them!
I love these Post-It Sticky notes. I take them with me in my purse so I can jot down everything from reminders to my grocery list. Super Adhesive and great take along size.

These sticks notes are excellent! They are made of one hundred percent recycled paper and are the perfect size to write to do lists, grocery lists, and to use in the office. The quality of these is great. I highly recommend these!

This review is for the Roll over image to zoom in Post-it 100% Recycled Paper Super Sticky Notes, 2X The Sticking Power, 4x6 in, Lined, 4 Pads/Pack, 45 Sheets/Pad, Canary Yellow(4621R-4SSCY) Note pads are very bendy having no backing. Other than that I like them. Need more colors

评论概述: Great size; sticks tight but easy to remove
评论详情: This Post-It notepads are great! Just like the regular square Post-Its but the larger size makes them perfect for shopping lists, to-do lists, etc. I appreciate the lines because my handwriting has a tendency to wander and become unruly, and I like the pastel colors because it's easier to read what I've written (unlike on the paper with darker colors).  The adhesive is nice and strong, so I can stick it on my car dashboard where it gets blown around by the AC and doesn't come loose. But when it's time to remove the list, no sticky residue is left behind.  I would definitely buy these again!

I am addicted to post it notes. Have been for years and it is my preferred option when needing to actually write something down to remind, inform, or label items around the house. I use them to temporarily add to a box or items for storing so that I know the contents and since this is the larger 4x6 size, I can organize and itemize everything in the box. Also perfect for writing down something you need when an electronic device isn't available or appropriate. These are also the best for jotting down a quick note to my husband because it shows up well, I can pop it on the front of something I know he'll see (frig, coffee maker, bathroom mirror) and they are bright and eye catching. There is a perfect amount of stickiness and the colors are beautiful! I love that they are recycled paper, as well!

I got these to use for a collaboration exercise where I am going to post peoples notes on a whiteboard. These stick great you can write on them I even use sharpies and they don’t bleed through. What I like about these post it notes is as with most of them you can remove them and put them in a different location and they still stick.

评论概述: Excellent Sticky notes, use them for work
评论详情: Even with all of the technology and computer software that we have today, sometimes a good old fashioned Sticky note is exactly what you need. These notes are excellent as always and the colors are very fitting for the Spring time right now. The adhesion is great and the writing ability on them is fantastic.

These post its are the perfect size for grocery lists. They are longer than the normal square post it. Great for short notes too, or even to send a happy note in your kiddo’s lunch! The pastel colors are pretty.

These 4" x 6" pads of lined Post-Its are a little larger than standard note cards, with 16 lines on each sheet.  I find them to be the perfect size for lists.  The Super Sticky adhesive is much needed given the larger size -- and it holds the paper well.  I always love that I can stick a Post-It note on a vertical surface, inside a book, or write on it while on its pad -- and it never leaves behind a trace.-- Debbie Lee Wesselmann

These are true, real Post-it's. The difference on these, which makes me want to write this review is that they are recycled. I use stickies a lot. I really appreciate that I can get recycled ones at a great value, and there is no dipping of quality. These are sticky, really colorful, and the perfect size for "todayslist". Thank you!

These are really a nice size and perfect for what I'm needing. They look like lined yellow legal tablet paper, and are about the size of a quarter sheet of paper (4x6"). They stick great and stay until you want to move them.  I really like that they're made from recycled paper, so I don't feel guilty about filling a wall with post-it notes for my research.
